title: 12/18/2020 - HOUR 1 - Herbert, Gruden, Saints
itunes:title: 12/18/2020 - HOUR 1 - Herbert, Gruden, Saints
description:
Justin Herbert is simply amazing

Jon Gruden isn't a good coach, especially in December

The Saints are going back to Drew Brees


Guest: Albert Breer
